thread.title: John McHugh, Army secretary: Women will likely have to register for the draft
thread.title_full: John McHugh, Army secretary: Women will likely have to register for the draft

author: BigLibSB
title: John McHugh, Army secretary: Women will likely have to register for the draft
text: John McHugh, Army secretary: Women will likely have to register for the draft - Washington Times Instead of the "war on women," women will be forced into war...you get to see your daughters come home in body bags...all in the name of gender equality...methinks many of those girls-in-arms will use their free choice to get pregnant and not have abortions so they can get sent home!!!! Anything to get away from war...
